title: Britain plans to end legal mandates for masks and social distancing on July 19, Boris Johnson says
content:
1. Britain plans to end legal mandates for masks and social distancing on July 19, Boris Johnson says  The Washington Post
  2. British PM Boris Johnson expected to announce end to mask mandate, social distancing | LIVE  Global News
  3. England takes a big Covid-19 gamble as Johnson plans to scrap remaining lockdown rules  CNN
  4. Johnson: UK must live with virus but restrictions can ease  Yahoo News
  5. Covid: Mask law and one metre rule set to end in England  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Britain plans to end legal mandates for masks and social distancing on July 19, Boris Johnson says  The Washington Post

localize.title: 英国は7月19日にマスクと社会的距離の法的義務を廃止する予定、ボリス・ジョンソン氏が発表
鲍里斯-约翰逊说，英国计划在7月19日结束对口罩和社会疏远的法律强制措施
鮑里斯-約翰遜說，英國計劃在7月19日結束對口罩和社會疏遠的法律強制措施
